summary:
## Haute Couture: A Summary

Haute couture is a special kind of high-end fashion design, meaning "high sewing" in French. It started in Paris in the 1800s, making fancy clothes with luxurious fabrics and careful hand-stitching.

Think of it like custom-made, super-fancy dresses for special occasions.  The term "couture" is often used to mean the same thing as haute couture.
title: Haute couture
